name: Cranberry Apple Bread
author: MS_TERESA
summary: This bread is a holiday favorite in our family. It's very festive and is a wonderful breakfast bread for Thanksgiving and Christmas morning. I like to prepare my bread batter ahead of time and thaw it out the night before I serve it. Just pop it in the oven in the morning and you have fresh breakfast bread. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 cups peeled, cored and chopped apple
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x5 inch baking pan
Stir together apples, sugar and oil
In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda and cinnamon
Stir flour mixture into wet ingredients, mixing just until dry ingredients are moist
Bake in preheated oven for 35 to 45 minutes, until toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean
